title: Cyclone 'Mocha' Approaching Odisha Coast
description: Severe cyclonic storm expected to make landfall in next 48 hours. Wind speeds up to 120 km/h expected. Coastal areas to evacuate immediately.
action_required: Evacuate coastal areas, move to cyclone shelters, secure properties

title: Heavy Rainfall Alert - Mahanadi River Rising
description: Mahanadi river water level rising rapidly due to continuous rainfall. Low-lying areas likely to be inundated in next 24 hours.
action_required: Move to higher ground, avoid river banks, prepare emergency supplies

title: Poor Air Quality - Industrial Zone
description: AQI levels have crossed 200 in industrial sectors. People with respiratory issues advised to stay indoors and wear masks.
action_required: Use N95 masks, avoid outdoor activities, keep windows closed

title: Heatwave Warning - Western Odisha
description: Temperature expected to soar above 44Â°C in western districts. Severe heatwave conditions likely for next 3 days.
action_required: Stay hydrated, avoid sun exposure 11AM-3PM, check on elderly neighbors

title: Landslide Risk in Hill Districts
description: Continuous rainfall has made hill slopes unstable. Landslide risk in ghat sections and hill roads.
action_required: Avoid travel on hill roads, stay away from slopes, report cracks immediately
